Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2013 12:07PM siatea21 wrote: Hi, my name is Tea and I am 51 years old on july 2, i just had both breast removed due to stage 2 cancel and yea i am scared because now i have an apointment on the 16th to see when i start chemo.Why do i have to do chemo if they have got it all.I have no family to support me on this or to be there with me please can someone give me answers on this ty
